page.title: 01Doxford Park
page.content: In this area, between two housing estates, there is a public park. It was originally part of the grounds of} {Doxford House.}The house is now owned by{Sunderland Polytechnic}and is used as a Hall of Residence. There is a stream that runs through the centre of the park; lawned play areas and mixed woodland. We found evidence of small wild animals, many different kinds of birds and wild flowers such as dogrose,red clover, black knapweed and great willowherb. Many of the local children use the park all year round as the gentle slopes are excellent for sledging in the winter.
